amendment.description: Amendment allocates $801,000 for land and transfer acquisitions activities associated with acquiring the land for the headquarters of the National Geospatial-Intelligence Agency.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce and then increase, the amount in the Military Construction Defense-Wide fund by $801,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Wagner amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Wagner amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mrs. Wagner.
